meanings.definition: The act of inflating something excessively.
meanings.sent1: The overinflation of the balloon caused it to burst.
meanings.sent2: The overinflation of prices led to a decrease in sales.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt at overinflation with the balloon animals resulted in comical shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her ego suffered from the overinflation of compliments she received.
meanings.sent5: The overinflation of the tire made it bulge dangerously.

meanings.definition: The state of being inflated beyond normal levels.
meanings.sent1: The overinflation of the economy caused a financial crisis.
meanings.sent2: The overinflation of the balloon made it difficult to tie.
meanings.sent3: The overinflation of the beach ball made it bounce unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: The overinflation of the story made it hard to believe.
meanings.sent5: The overinflation of the air mattress made it uncomfortable to sleep on.
